StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAShowAllForSSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ssn varchar(10) as set NOCOUNT on
declare @person_id int
set @person_id = (select person_id from person where social_security_number = @ssn)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***PERSON_INFORMATION***PERSON_INFORMATION***PERSON_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'PERSON' AS TABLE_NAME,* from PERSON where PERSON_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***MARINE_INFORMATION***MARINE_CANDIDATE_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'MARINE' AS TABLE_NAME,* from MARINE where MARINE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***MARINE_CANDIDATE_INFORMATION***MARINE_CANDIDATE_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'MARINE_CANDIDATE' AS TABLE_NAME,* from MARINE_CANDIDATE where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***PFT***PFT***PFT***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'PFT' AS TABLE_NAME,* from PFT where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_EDUCATION***CANDIDATE_EDUCATION***CANDIDATE_EDUCATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'CANDIDATE_EDUCATION' AS TABLE_NAME,* from CANDIDATE_EDUCATION where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***ALIEN_REGISTRATION***ALIEN_REGISTRATION***ALIEN_REGISTRATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'ALIEN_REGISTRATION' AS TABLE_NAME,* from ALIEN_REGISTRATION where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_ADDRESS***CANDIDATE_ADDRESS***CANDIDATE_ADDRESS***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'CANDIDATE_ADDRESS' AS TABLE_NAME, * FROM CANDIDATE_ADDRESS WHERE marine_candidate_id = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE***CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE***CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE' AS TABLE_NAME, * FROM CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE WHERE marine_candidate_id = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***NWA_INFORMATION***NWA_INFORMATION***NWA_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'NWA' AS TABLE_NAME,* from NWA where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id order by NWA_ID
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CONTRACT_MIRS***CONTRACT_MIRS***CONTRACT_MIRS***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'MICONTRACT' AS TABLE_NAME,* from [MICONTRACT] where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CONTRACT_INFORMATION***CONTRACT_INFORMATION***CONTRACT_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'CONTRACT' AS TABLE_NAME,* from [CONTRACT] where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id) order by CONTRACT_ID
print '===================================================================================================' print ' ***OFFICER_CONTRACT_INFORMATION***OFFICER_CONTRACT_INFORMATION***OFFICER_CONTRACT_INFORMATION***' print '===================================================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'OFFICER_CONTRACT' AS TABLE_NAME,* from OFFICER_CONTRACT where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id) order by CONTRACT_ID
print '===================================================================================================' print ' ***COMMISSIONEE***COMMISSIONEE***COMMISSIONEE***' print '===================================================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'COMMISSIONEE' AS TABLE_NAME, * from COMMISSIONEE where CONTRACT_ID in (select CONTRACT_ID from OFFICER_CONTRACT where NWA_ID IN (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)) order by COMMISSIONEE_ID
print '============================================================================' print '***QSN_INFORMATION***QSN_INFORMATION***QSN_INFORMATION***QSN_INFORMATION***' print '============================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'QSN' AS TABLE_NAME,* from QSN where CONTRACT_ID in (select contract_id from contract where nwa_id in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)) order by CONTRACT_ID
print '======================================================================' print '***PROGRAM_INFORMATION***PROGRAM_INFORMATION***PROGRAM_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY' AS TABLE_NAME,* from PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY where CONTRACT_ID in (select contract_id from contract where nwa_id in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)) order by CONTRACT_ID
print '======================================================================' print ' ***SHIP_INFORMATION***SHIP_INFORMATION***SHIP_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'SHIPPER' AS TABLE_NAME,* from SHIPPER where CONTRACT_ID in (select contract_id from contract where nwa_id in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)) order by SHIP_ID
print '======================================================================' print ' ***SHIP_INFORMATION***SHIP_INFORMATION***SHIP_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'RECRUIT_TRAINING' AS TABLE_NAME,* from RECRUIT_TRAINING where Ship_ID in ( select Ship_ID from SHIPPER where CONTRACT_ID in ( select contract_id from contract where nwa_id in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)))
print '======================================================================' print ' ***OCS***OCS***OCS***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'OCS' AS TABLE_NAME,* from OCS where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***OCS_Class***OCS***OCS***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'ProjectedGradDateHistory' AS TABLE_NAME,* from Projected_Grad_Date_History where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***PRECOMMISSION_DATA***PRECOMMISSION_DATA***PRECOMMISSION_DATA***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'PRECOMMISSION_DATA' AS TABLE_NAME,* from PRECOMMISSION_DATA where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***OFFICER_ACCESSION***OFFICER_ACCESSION***OFFICER_ACCESSION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'OFFICER_ACCESSION' AS TABLE_NAME,* from OFFICER_ACCESSION where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_OCCR***CANDIDATE_OCCR***CANDIDATE_OCCR***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'CANDIDATE_OCCR' AS TABLE_NAME,* from CANDIDATE_OCCR where marine_candidate_id = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***REFERRAL_INFORMATION***REFERRAL_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'REFERRAL' AS TABLE_NAME,* from REFERRAL where CONTRACT_ID in (select contract_id from contract where nwa_id IN (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id))
print '======================================================================' print ' ***RESERVE_REFERRAL_INFORMATION***RESERVE_REFERRAL_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'RESERVE_REFERRAL' AS TABLE_NAME, * from RESERVE_REFERRAL where REFERRAL_ID IN (SELECT REFERRAL_ID from REFERRAL where CONTRACT_ID in (select contract_id from contract where nwa_id in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)))
print '======================================================================' print ' ***MEPS_SCHEDULE_INFORMATION***MEPS_SCHEDULE_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'MEPS_SCHEDULE' AS TABLE_NAME,* from MEPS_SCHEDULE where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM***CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM' AS TABLE_NAME,* from CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_ASVAB***CANDIDATE_ASVAB***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
SELECT 'CANDIDATE_ASVAB' AS TABLE_NAME,* FROM CANDIDATE_ASVAB WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM***CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM' AS TABLE_NAME,* FROM CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM***CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM' AS TABLE_NAME,* FROM CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_STATUS_INFORMATION***CANDIDATE_STATUS_INFORMATION***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
/* --Previous Version: select 'CANDIDATE_STATUS' AS TABLE_NAME,* from CANDIDATE_STATUS where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id) order by NWA_ID, STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE */
SELECT 'CANDIDATE_STATUS' AS TABLE_NAME, c.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID, c.NWA_ID, c.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, c.COMMENTS, c.STATUS_TYPE, c.STATUS_CODE, c.DISPOSITION_CODE, s.STATUS_DESCRIPTION + ' - ' + s.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION as STATUS_DISPOSITION, c.USER_LOGIN, c.UPDATE_DATE, c.rowguid
FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS c (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION s (NOLOCK) ON c.STATUS_TYPE = s.STATUS_TYPE AND c.STATUS_CODE = s.STATUS_CODE AND c.DISPOSITION_CODE = s.DISPOSITION_CODE where c.NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id) order by c.NWA_ID, c.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE
print '======================================================================' print ' ***CANDIDATE_WAIVERS***CANDIDATE_WAIVERS***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
SELECT 'CANDIDATE_WAIVER' AS TABLE_NAME,* FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***OFFICER_CANDIDATE_WAIVERS***OFFICER_CANDIDATE_WAIVERS***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
SELECT 'OFFICER_WAIVER' AS TABLE_NAME,* FROM OFFICER_WAIVER where NWA_ID in (select nwa_id from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id)
print '======================================================================' print ' ***MCRISS_OLAP***APPLICANT_INTEGRATED***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'APPLICANT_INTEGRATED' as TABLE_NAME, APPLICANT_ID, MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID,LAST_NAME, STATUS_CODE + '-' + DISPOSITION_CODE AS StatusCombo, STATUS_DESCRIPTION + ' - ' + DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION as StatusComboDesc, STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, DECLARED_DATE,MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE,DATE_OF_ENLISTMENT, SHIP_DATE,MCRD_GRADUATION_DATE,DEP_DISCHARGE_DATE, ORGANIZATION_ID ,* from MCRISS_OLAP.dbo.APPLICANT_INTEGRATED WITH (NOLOCK) where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
print '======================================================================' print ' ***MCRISS_OLAP***OFFICER_APPLICANT_INTEGRATED***' print '======================================================================' print '' print ''
select 'OFFICER_APPLICANT_INTEGRATED' as TABLE_NAME, APPLICANT_ID, MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, OSS_ORG_ID, LAST_NAME, STATUS_CODE + '-' + DISPOSITION_CODE AS StatusCombo, STATUS_DESCRIPTION + ' - ' + DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION as StatusComboDesc, STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, CLASS_ID, CLASS_FISCAL_YEAR, CONTRACT_ID,CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, COMPONENT_CODE,COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION,MCRC_RECEIVED_DATE, MAILED_TO_DISTRICT_DATE, DIST_ORG_ID, DISTRICT_ACTION_DATE, SCHEDULE_SHIP_DATE, COMMISSION_DATE, DISCHARGE_CODE, DISCHARGE_DATE,DISCHARGE_REASON ,* from MCRISS_OLAP.dbo.OFFICER_APPLICANT_INTEGRATED WITH (NOLOCK) where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id
